Context: "John asks Jesus for Him to show them (the deciples) the father."
Translation: “Have I been with you all this time
column8: and yet you still don’t know who I am? Anyone who has seen me has seen the Father! So why are you asking me to show him to you?"

column7: with the glory which I had with You before the world was."
column9: after finishing His works here on earth tells His disciples about His coming death and resurrection. Then
column10: he looks to heaven and speaks to God."
